com.intel.icecp.module.fork.attributes

Class MessageFilterAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.icecp.core.attributes.BaseAttribute<T>
      • com.intel.icecp.core.attributes.WriteableBaseAttribute<String>
        • com.intel.icecp.module.fork.attributes.MessageFilterAttribute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.intel.icecp.core.Attribute<String>, com.intel.icecp.core.attributes.WriteableAttribute<String>

    public class MessageFilterAttribute
extends com.intel.icecp.core.attributes.WriteableBaseAttribute<String>
    Used for creating a message-filter attribute MESSAGE_FILTER which defines the matching criteria for messages in order to fork into multiple channels. This attribute expects a valid JsonPath expression. Eg: If the user wants to match criteria to be sensorIdentifier, then the content of JSON configuration should contain this "message-filter" : "$.sensoridentifier"
